name: KL00236-2_DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I GSANG BA SGRUB PA'I DON MNGON PAR THOB PA'I RGYU, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' THAMS CAD KYI SPYOD PA RGYA MTSO STON PA, SANGS RGYAS KYI GTZUG TOR DPA' BAR 'GRO BA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO +.txt
download_path: /kangyur updated to 11 15 23 ws/10. mdo mang_collection of sutras (sūtra)$$/vol 20 (wa)/kl00236-2_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu, byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtso ston pa, sangs rgyas kyi gtzug tor dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo +.txt
meta_text: ('_An Exalted Sutra of the Greater Way entitled “Coming to Courage: The Crown Jewel of the Buddha, which Imparts the Ocean of the Activities of All of the Bodhisattvas—Which are Themselves the Cause for Achieving the Goal; the Secrets of Those Who Have Gone That Way” (Sarva Tathāgatasya Guhya Siddhyartha Abhisamaya Hetu Sarva Bodhisattvasya Carya Samudra Desha Buddhoṣṇīṣa Śuranga Nāma Mahāyāna Sūtra)', 'text')
title_tib: DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I GSANG BA SGRUB PA'I DON MNGON PAR THOB PA'I RGYU, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' THAMS CAD KYI SPYOD PA RGYA MTSO STON PA, SANGS RGYAS KYI GTZUG TOR DPA' BAR 'GRO BA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO
title_eng: An Exalted Sutra of the Greater Way entitled “Coming to Courage: The Crown Jewel of the Buddha, which Imparts the Ocean of the Activities of All of the Bodhisattvas—Which are Themselves the Cause for Achieving the Goal; the Secrets of Those Who Have Gone That Way” (Sarva Tathāgatasya Guhya Siddhyartha Abhisamaya Hetu Sarva Bodhisattvasya Carya Samudra Desha Buddhoṣṇīṣa Śuranga Nāma Mahāyāna Sūtra)', 'text')
